pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: High-level introduction to Snap.Hutao, a comprehensive Genshin Impact desktop toolkit for Windows. Covers the application's primary purpose, major subsystems, and architectural approach.

pages.title: Application Bootstrap and Lifecycle
pages.purpose: Details the application startup sequence, activation handling (launch, protocol, notifications), window management, system tray integration, and lifecycle state management.

pages.title: Game Integration
pages.purpose: Overview of Snap.Hutao's integration with Genshin Impact, including game launching, modification capabilities, package management, and configuration handling.

pages.title: Game Launch System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the game launcher, including LaunchGameViewModel, execution strategies (default, resume, convert), launch options, and game path detection.

pages.title: Island Interop and Game Modifications
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the GameIslandInterop system, DLL injection mechanism, shared memory architecture, FOV/FPS modifications, and runtime game enhancement features.

pages.title: Game Package Management
pages.purpose: Explains the game package verification, update, and predownload systems, including interaction with HoyoPlay APIs, manifest decoding, and asset extraction.

pages.title: Game Account and Settings Management
pages.purpose: Documents the game account system (registry-based storage, MAC address encryption), launch scheme detection, and config.ini parsing.

pages.title: User Interface Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of the WinUI 3 XAML-based UI architecture, MVVM pattern implementation, resource management, and user-facing features.

pages.title: XAML Resources and Theming
pages.purpose: Details the App.xaml resource dictionary structure, merged dictionaries (37 total), theme system, custom controls, and styling architecture.

pages.title: ViewModel Architecture and MVVM Patterns
pages.purpose: Explains the ViewModel base class, lifecycle management (LoadAsync, Uninitialize, Resurrect), IAdvancedCollectionView usage, command patterns, and message-driven coordination.

pages.title: Game Data Features
pages.purpose: Overview of user-facing game data management features including avatar tracking, achievements, and cultivation planning.

pages.title: Avatar and Character Management
pages.purpose: Documents AvatarPropertyViewModel, summary factory, Hoyolab sync, wiki avatar data, filtering system, and export functionality.

pages.title: Achievement System
pages.purpose: Covers AchievementViewModel, UIAF import/export, achievement archive management, search/filter capabilities, and embedded Yae integration.

pages.title: Cultivation Planning System
pages.purpose: Explains CultivationViewModel, material calculation, resin statistics, inventory management, and offline calculator architecture.

pages.title: Development and Testing Tools
pages.purpose: Documents TestViewModel, setting overrides, debug utilities, asset extraction tools, and Hutao Cloud service testing interfaces.

pages.title: Service Layer Architecture
pages.purpose: Overview of the service-oriented architecture, dependency injection patterns, and core service abstractions.

pages.title: Metadata Service and Caching
pages.purpose: Deep dive into MetadataService initialization, three-tier caching strategy (memory/file/remote), metadata contexts, image caching with theme support, and background image management.

pages.title: Game Data Services
pages.purpose: Documents services for avatar info, achievements, cultivation data, and their interaction with database layer and external APIs.

pages.title: Cloud Services Integration
pages.purpose: Covers Hutao Cloud backend integration (Passport authentication, GachaLog service, record upload, announcements), Hoyolab API integration, and HTTP exception handling.

pages.title: Infrastructure and Foundation
pages.purpose: Overview of foundational systems including localization, packaging, and build infrastructure.

pages.title: Localization System
pages.purpose: Documents the 14-language localization system, resource file architecture, Crowdin integration, developer workflow, and runtime resolution.

pages.title: Application Packaging and Windows Integration
pages.purpose: Explains MSIX/MSI package variants (Release/Dev), application identity, toast notification COM activation, protocol activation, capabilities, and elevated launch system.

pages.title: Build System and CI/CD Pipeline
pages.purpose: Details the three-tier build pipeline (Alpha/Canary/Release), build.cake orchestration, version management strategies, AppxManifest mutation, and SignPath integration.
